page.title: 20HEALTH CONTINUED
page.content: {AMBULANCES} Greenbank is the site of one of plymouths ambulance stations. There are plans for a central station by the end of the century. There are twenty ambulances of various types, including a driver.The men work in groups of 6 to 8 men on one of four shifts. {GENERAL PRACTICE} We identified a total of nineteen doctors working in ten practices. Only one had a purpose built surgery. We also identified fourteen dentists working in twelve practices, three chiropracters working in two practices, three chiropodists working independently and four physiotherapists also working on their own. The last three categories come into the private sector.
